cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent the gNB from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the downlink carrier bandwidth to an excessively high value of 1000 will exceed the maximum allowed bandwidth for the frequency band and cause configuration validation failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行載波頻寬設定為過高的值 1000，將超過頻率頻帶允許的最大頻寬，並導致配置驗證失敗。
